entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: A sly and cunning wizard who is a portrait in the room where Harry and Dumbledore are having their conversation.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore have an argument about how Dumbledore understands Harry's feelings.
Phineas Nigellus teases Harry by saying that students hate it when teachers try to understand them.
